product_name: PUMA Faas 500TR GTX Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Faas 500TR GTX Trail-Running Shoes from PUMA are their most technical trail-running shoes, built for the rigors of any terrain you set your mind to. GORE-TEX(R) waterproof upper with breathable mesh, bonded synthetic suede overlays. Sockliner provides great responsiveness and step-in comfort. Gusseted tongue keeps debris out and provides a secure fit. Proprietary nidsole foam is lightweight, resilient and durable, and provides a smooth ride through the gait cycle. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a more midfoot strike for trail running. Highly abrasion-resistant sticky rubber on outsoles provides grip; multidirectional lugs provide 360#&176; traction during braking and toe-off. Decoupled heel allows for a more gradual transition from heel strike to mid-stance. Lateral release grooves provide optimum compression/release on the lateral side, slow the rate of pronation and offer a smooth gait. The men's Faas 500TR GTX Trail-Running Shoes from PUMA are compatible with gaiters. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Faas 500TR GTX Trail-Running Shoes from PUMA are their most technical trail-running shoes, built for the rigors of any terrain you set your mind to.
